description: These tasty and easy meatball subs are perfect for speedy and simple comfort food.
name: Mushroom & Lentil Meatball Subs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium onion, peeled and diced, divided
2 cloves garlic, peeled and minced, divided

recipeInstructions.text: Place the lentils in a large pan of water and bring to the boil. Simmer for 15 minutes and drain. Add to a food processor. Heat the oil in a pan on medium heat and cook the onion for 5 minutes. Tip half of the onion into the food processor with the lentils, mushrooms, oats, a clove of garlic and lemon zest. Blitz until smooth.
Preheat the oven to 180Â°C. Roll the lentil mix into 16 balls and place on a greased baking tray. Bake for 30 minutes.

Add the garlic and oregano to the pan with the rest of the onion and cook for 34 minutes. Pour over the chopped tomatoes, reduce the heat and simmer for 10 minutes. Add the cooked meatballs to the sauce.
Spoon the meatballs and sauce into the baguettes and sprinkle vegan mozzarella on top. Place on a baking tray and under a hot grill for 23 minutes until the cheese has melted and serve.
